you know.translation[0].definitions[1].d: used to make sure that someone understands what you are saying
you know.translation[0].definitions[1].e: I felt very upset, you know?
you know.translation[0].definitions[2].d: used when you want to keep someone’s attention, but cannot think of what to say next
you know.translation[0].definitions[2].e: Well, you know, we’ve got a job to do here.
you know.translation[0].definitions[3].d: used when you are explaining or describing something and want to give more information
you know.translation[0].definitions[3].e: That flower in the garden – you know, the purple one – what is it?
